title: T206 FS: Marquard, Old Mill, Tolstoi, WST, HOF, PSA 4, etc...
author: jrlebert

posts.post_title: T206 FS: Marquard, Old Mill, Tolstoi, WST, HOF, PSA 4, etc...
posts.post_content:
All kinds of T206 for sale... looking for PayPal friends, but check/MO/cash always OK, too.

Sorry for the size of scans.  Still looking for a good way to reduce image size but still capture quality (or, for some of these, lack of quality) 

Offers may be made via PM or [url]jrlebert@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking

Duffy Piedmont 460
Leifield Piedmont 350 (with WST, I believe)
Clancy Sovereign 350
Meyers Tolstoi
Clymer Piedmont 350 (Topps 206 buyback)

Al Bridwell (no cap) Piedmont 150 PSA 4
Joe Kelley Piedmont 350 PSA 3
Jimmy Jackson Old Mill PSA 4 - SOLD
Rube Marquard (portrait) Sweet Caporal 350 PSA 4
